hero.title: Preserve the Memory
hero.description: Luysar provides professional cemetery cleaning services, grave care, and monument cleaning in Yerevan and throughout Armenia. We help preserve the memory of your loved ones by offering high-quality headstone cleaning, removing dirt, moss, and buildup using gentle methods.

servicesIntro.title: Services Tailored for You
servicesIntro.description: We offer gravestone cleaning services using specialized techniques to remove dirt and moss, ensuring a respectful process.

serviceBlock.title: Gentle Gravestone Cleaning
serviceBlock.description: Careful cleaning of the monument surface using mild detergents and low-pressure water.

serviceBlock2.title: Deep Cleaning with Specialized Products
serviceBlock2.description: Use of specialized chemical compounds to remove persistent dirt and residue from the stone surface.

process.title: Simple Process
process.description: We ensure transparent communication at every stage of the project to understand your needs and deliver satisfying results.
process.step1: We provide a consultation, determine the scope of work, and agree on a visit date.
process.step2: We inspect the memorial on site and select appropriate cleaning solutions.
process.step3: We perform the cleaning, remove dirt, and restore the appearance of the monument.
